20110107211820.000|20110107211823.000|TR0|Remember the Unabomber?  Ted Kaczynski.  
20110107211823.000|20110107211825.000|TR0|He had sent a manifest to "The New York 
20110107211825.000|20110107211827.000|TR0|Times."  There was another expected at 
20110107211827.000|20110107211830.000|TR0|"The Washington Post."  And so my old 
20110107211830.000|20110107211832.000|TR0|partner and I, we went down and spoke to 
20110107211832.000|20110107211835.000|TR0|David Graham, who was one of the 
20110107211835.000|20110107211837.000|TR0|publishers of "The Washington Post" and we

20110107211839.000|20110107211842.000|TR0|manifesto from this Unabomber.  And they

20110107211844.000|20110107211846.000|TR0|to our mailroom employees about that? We 
20110107211846.000|20110107211849.000|TR0|said, not at all.
20110107211849.000|20110107211851.000|TR0|
20110107211851.000|20110107211853.000|TR0|So we were down waiting for everybody to 
20110107211853.000|20110107211856.000|TR0|come back from lunch, and I'm just kind of 
20110107211856.000|20110107211858.000|TR0|looking around on table where all the mail 
20110107211858.000|20110107211900.000|TR0|was coming in and I saw the envelope that 
20110107211900.000|20110107211903.000|TR0|was there.  What we did, we were able to 
20110107211903.000|20110107211905.000|TR0|take that envelope, take it down to the 
20110107211905.000|20110107211907.000|TR0|FBI lab, open it up under a hood and we 
20110107211907.000|20110107211910.000|TR0|were able to retrieve trace evidence -- 
20110107211910.000|20110107211912.000|TR0|hairs, fibers.  And we were able to match 
20110107211912.000|20110107211914.000|TR0|up hairs from a rug and from a dog that 
20110107211914.000|20110107211917.000|TR0|was in Ted Kaczynski's cabin and that's 
20110107211917.000|20110107211919.000|TR0|what helped make that particular case.

20110107213250.000|20110107213252.000|TR0|of infrastructure here in Washington.
20110107213252.000|20110107213254.000|TR0|
20110107213254.000|20110107213257.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  What about, Eric, the 
20110107213257.000|20110107213259.000|TR0|significance of this particular postal 
20110107213259.000|20110107213301.000|TR0|facility?  Tell me again the mail that 
20110107213301.000|20110107213304.000|TR0|comes into this facility goes where?       
20110107213304.000|20110107213306.000|TR0| MARRAPODI:  Well, you'll remember, after 
20110107213306.000|20110107213308.000|TR0|the anthrax attacks, when congressional 
20110107213308.000|20110107213311.000|TR0|officers and media folks were getting 
20110107213311.000|20110107213313.000|TR0|anthrax letters, the government sort of 
20110107213313.000|20110107213315.000|TR0|pulled an audible if you will in how they 
20110107213315.000|20110107213318.000|TR0|handle that mail service.
20110107213318.000|20110107213320.000|TR0|

20110107213327.000|20110107213329.000|TR0|and Senate office buildings.  So that's 
20110107213329.000|20110107213332.000|TR0|why this facility sorts this out, just in

20110107214343.000|20110107214345.000|TR0|bomb tech you never want to put your hand

20110107214348.000|20110107214350.000|TR0|don't have to.  That's why you've got 
20110107214350.000|20110107214352.000|TR0|these robots.  Send them down.  You can 
20110107214352.000|20110107214355.000|TR0|look at it, manipulate it. And if it's 
20110107214355.000|20110107214357.000|TR0|coming through the mail, you can take 
20110107214357.000|20110107214359.000|TR0|something and throw it around, and usually 
20110107214359.000|20110107214402.000|TR0|it will go.
20110107214402.000|20110107214404.000|TR0|
20110107214404.000|20110107214406.000|TR0|But this one, it did.  It was because of 
20110107214406.000|20110107214409.000|TR0|the makeup of this -- we're calling them 
20110107214409.000|20110107214411.000|TR0|electric matches -- that it could be 
20110107214411.000|20110107214414.000|TR0|susceptible to shock or friction.  And 
20110107214414.000|20110107214416.000|TR0|that's why it did go off, apparently when 
20110107214416.000|20110107214418.000|TR0|the worker threw it over into a bin.
20110107214418.000|20110107214421.000|TR0|
20110107214421.000|20110107214423.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  You know, according to this
